comments.body: does it support subdirectories? If so, can we show that as an example? or if not, say no subdirectories?
It should (https://github.com/ansible-community/antsibull/blob/main/antsibull/extra_docs.py#L54). But I haven't tried it, and I'm not aware of examples :)
I think it does support subdirectories, but I don't think we have any examples that use that functionality yet. I'd vote for merging this, then updating it when we have some more complex examples.

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +69,73 @@       - scenario_guide

The index page of the documentation for your collection displays the title you define in ``docs/docsite/extra-docs.yml`` with a link to your extra documentation. For an example, see the `community.docker collection repo <https://github.com/ansible-collections/community.docker/tree/main/docs/docsite>`_ and the `community.docker collection documentation <https://docs.ansible.com/ansible/latest/collections/community/docker/index.html>`_.
